name: Daring Terror
description:
Daring Terror is a game created with most of the rules of the Spooktober 3rd Annual Visual Novel Jam by DevTalk. After waking up, you decide to ask your friends (Amelia, Lily, Rose, Elizabeth and Clementine) to hang out during Halloween. Each person dresses up and decides to hang out at yours and Amelia's apartment to decide what they should do during Halloween. 

Explore a haunted house, watch movies and hang out with your friends in Daring Terror.

Daring Terror will be a Daring Academy DLC later on.

Want to support the game, or just want to listen to the songs in this game? You can buy the soundtrack here!
